identity.name: Nexus HR
principles: Visual Hierarchy via Contrast, not Color

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and modal titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all standard text, table data, and form inputs. Excellent legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for Employee IDs, Transaction Codes, and API keys.

primary.name: International Indigo
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, key data points.

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm

cards.style: bg-white dark:bg-slate-950 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-600 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-950/70 border border-white/20 shadow-sm
visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors for professional clarity.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dashboard backgrounds (opacity 0.02) to reduce sterility.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with 50% black overlay

instructions: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text. Import via Google Fonts in index.css.
Implement a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar and Topbar structure.
Use the 'Bento Grid' philosophy for the Dashboard: Mix 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 widgets.
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' and 'zod' for validation.
Use 'recharts' for analytics. Style them to match the 'International Indigo' palette.
For the Employee Table, use a data-table component with pagination, filtering, and sorting.
Login page must be split 50/50 or centered card on the 'login_background' image.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
DO NOT center text in cards unless it is a specific 'stat' widget.
ALWAYS use 'gap-4' or 'gap-6' in flex/grid containers. Avoid 'margin' hacks.
Interactive elements must have a ':hover' state defined.
Borders should be subtle: 'border-slate-200' in light mode.
Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links for testing.
